channel.title: CVE Feed for Learningdigital.com, Inc. -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Learningdigital.com, Inc. -- all products

item.title: CVE-2021-35966|2024-09-16T17:54:15.142Z -- learningdigital.com%2C%20inc. -- orca%20hcm
item.description: The specific function of the Orca HCM digital learning platform does not filter input parameters properly, which causing the URL can be redirected to any website. Remote attackers can use the vulnerability to execute phishing attacks.

item.title: CVE-2021-35967|2024-09-16T16:27:48.675Z -- learningdigital.com%2C%20inc. -- orca%20hcm
item.description: The directory page parameter of the Orca HCM digital learning platform does not filter special characters. Remote attackers can access the system directory thru Path Traversal without logging in.
